relation: I enjoy drawing and going fishing in the summer.

The college is very close to my home and my job. I am hoping with my grades I can attend with some assistance from the college. I plan to come here for my first two years then transfer to bowling green.
pageTitle: Lorain County Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {129851=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 9462=LCCC does not provide dorms for its students because it is a local college. However there are two apartment complexes, Commodore Arms Apartments and College Park Townhouses, that are located directly across the street from the college. They offer a variety of features, including Internet, washer and dryer, patios, air conditioning, and much more. They also offer a $1000 dollar scholarship for LCCC! They are close to shopping centers and major highways, making them ideal spots to live if you do not or cannot live at home., 17569=For a community college that costs about 1500 a semester it's decent. Especially if you are looking for a place to get your foot in the door. I'm sure plenty of other students had wonderful experiences, I ,unfortunately, did not., 51477=It is rather affordable to go to this school, about 1500 a semester. Plus books, but if you work and live at home it is a nice price. They have a few scholarships and FAFSA normally provides a decent amount of money, i honestly got paid to go to school at one point. I had extra financial aid and got a check for about 500 dollars.}

textAfterTable: Bang for the buck For the most part, I would say it's decently priced considering that it's a community school. Am enjoying being here I don't like being there for my own personal reasons, but it's a different experience for everyone. Am learning a lot I think most of the professors are extremely intelligent and know what they are talking about. I've liked all of my professors so far and I've taken a lot of classes. Even your teachers online have a number of helpful tools to get you through the course. Login to rate or flag the reviews Mariah from Lorain, OH 03/22/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 29 Categories Comments Campus Safety Lorain County Community College offers a 24 hour security service that can be accessed
